title: They live again
creator_credit: A. Reginald Dobson and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: This film (which is a shortened version of the long film “Accident Service”, 312704) deals with the service provided for injured miners in Great Britain, in a modern hospital and rehabilitation centre in the Midlands. All stages of the treatment of their injuries, and their psyhological rehabiliation are vividly presented.
